items.title: CRYOPRESERVATION
items.description:
• Is a technique to freeze and then thaw sperm, eggs or embryos for use in IVF cycles.
  • The cells or tissues are preserved using liquid nitrogen at -196 degree Celsius.
  • These temperatures effectively stop all biological activities of cells and tissues providing an indefinite longevity in cells.

items.title: CHOCOLATE CYST
items.description:
Ovarian cysts containing brownish thick old blood that appears like melted chocolate.

Found in patients with endometriosis

sections.title: Symptoms:
sections.description:
• Pain during periods
  • Chronic pelvic pain
  • Infertility
  • Pain during intercourse

sections.title: Treatment:
sections.description:
• Medical management – use of medicines or injections to provide pain relief.
  • Surgical Management – Laparoscopic removal of cysts.
  • ART – assisted reproductive techniques like IUI or IVF in patients with infertility
